1.title: Your Worst Fear
1.plot: Thomas Everton goes missing. His best friend Luke tries to find him. Along the way he meets a smart kid named Milo Wilkins. They try to learn about a parallel universe called Blackmail.

2.title: The Initiation
2.plot: Thomas Everton goes missing. Luke and Milo learn more about the parallel universe called Blackmail. The hunt begins.

3.title: The Rescue Operation
3.plot: Milo and Luke meet Milo's long lost friend, Lucas. But they have yet to discover that Lucas has some special abilities. They are so close to rescuing Caleb and Thomas from the dreaded hands of the so-called Torturer.

imdb.plot outline: Thomas Everton was a creative boy. One day walking home from school, he goes missing. His friend Luke Wilkins needs to help find him before it's too late. Along with another group of kids, Luke tries to find the kidnapper that stole Thomas. But when they uncover the true secret, they realize that the kidnapper, isn't really a kidnapper. Thomas had been sucked into a parallel universe known as Blackmail. They all must stop Blackmail from leaking into the real world before it's too late.
imdb.title: Blackmail
plot: A creative young boy goes missing. A group of kids help find him. But along the hunt they realize that there is more than just a kidnapping, but a parallel universe known as _Blackmail_ (qv).::Riley Rutter

Thomas Everton was a creative boy. One day walking home from school, he goes missing. His friend Luke Wilkins needs to help find him before it's too late. Along with another group of kids, Luke tries to find the kidnapper that stole Thomas. But when they uncover the true secret, they realize that the kidnapper, isn't really a kidnapper. Thomas had been sucked into a parallel universe known as _Blackmail_ (qv). They all must stop _Blackmail_ (qv) from leaking into the real world before it's too late.::Riley Rutter
